HOMEPAGE.TITLE_BLACK: A circular source of inspiration and expertise
HOMEPAGE.INTRO_1: Welcome to the database of 'let's upcycle'. A unique application that links 5 themes around circularity.
HOMEPAGE.INTRO_2: Easily search and get inspired. Or easily add materials or expertise yourself. You can use filters or search on the map. Highlight your organisation or residual stream or find the right business partner.
HOMEPAGE.INTRO_3: The application is available both on desktop and on your mobile.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION2_INTRO: There is a lot to discover in different categories. Press one of the category buttons to discover what they mean.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION3_CARD1_DESCRIPTION: By selecting a category, you will get the data that matches it, This way you will find what you are looking for faster
HOMEPAGE.SECTION3_CARD2_DESCRIPTION: If you want to find items close by, search by location. You can enter a location or use your current location.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION3_CARD3_DESCRIPTION: Use the additional filters to further refine your search results to your liking.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION5_INTRO: Would you like to contribute yourself by offering your surplus waste, or by giving inspiration to others. Then create an account and start adding.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION6_CARD1_DESCRIPTION: Do you want to improve waste management in your company, cut costs and pollute less? Upcycle Your Waste offers you a free tailor-made step-by-step programme. To make improvements there, this site/application has been created.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION6_CARD2_DESCRIPTION: Ostend has had an Economic House since 1 February 2008. This makes it the first city or municipality in Flanders to offer this free service to its entrepreneurs. The Economic House acts as a contact point for every business. In addition, the non-profit organisation sets up creative projects with public administrations, employers' and employees' organisations to promote economic life in the district of Ostend.
HOMEPAGE.SECTION6_CARD3_DESCRIPTION: VIVES has campuses in Bruges, Kortrijk, Ostend, Roeselare and Torhout. In addition, Vives is strong in practice-based research and services, providing companies and organisations with solutions to various complex issues.

FOOTER.DOWNLOAD: Download the app from the Playstore or Appstore.

FORBIDDEN_PAGE.TITLE: Forbidden
FORBIDDEN_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: The page you want to visit is out of range or does not exist.
FORBIDDEN_PAGE.BUTTON: Go back to the home page

ADD_OFFER_PAGE.TITLE: Add a new item to our database.
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This page allows you to add your data to the site.
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_MATERIALS: You can select multiple materials. Select a material and/or sub-material and press the button to add it.
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.DESCRIPTION_TAGS: You can select multiple tags or add one yourself. These tags can be used to refine search results later.
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.LABEL_URL_TO_SITE: URL link to own site (start with https://)
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.LABEL_PICTURES: Choose a file or drag u picture here
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.READY_LABEL: When you have finished filling in you can proceed to the next step.
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.ADD_LANG_DESCRIPTION1: Here you can optionally add a title and/or description in another language. you can also optionally skip this step.
ADD_OFFER_PAGE.ADD_LANG_DESCRIPTION2: Which language would you like to add?

EDIT_OFFER_PAGE.TITLE: Customise your item
EDIT_OFFER_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Here you can customise your item.

MESSAGES.TITLE2: Title must be at least 1 characters long
MESSAGES.TITLE3: Title cannot be more than 150 characters long
MESSAGES.DESCRIPTION2: Description must be at least 1 characters long
MESSAGES.STREET_NUMBER: Street and number cannot be more than 250 characters long
MESSAGES.CITY: City cannot be more than 250 characters long
MESSAGES.COUNTRY: Country cannot be more than 250 characters long
MESSAGES.URL: Url cannot be more than 250 characters long
MESSAGES.CONTACT: Contact cannot be more than 250 characters long
MESSAGES.TERMS: You must accept terms and conditions
MESSAGES.IMAGES2: You must accept terms and conditions

EMAIL_VERIFY_PAGE.TITLE: Verify you account.
EMAIL_VERIFY_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Before proceeding, Do you need to verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed you? If you did not receive the email, we will gladly send you a new one.

ACCOUNT_PAGE.TITLE: My Account
ACCOUNT_PAGE.NO_FAVORITES: Nothing has been added to your favourites yet. Please explore the different items and add them to you favourites.
ACCOUNT_PAGE.NO_ITEMS: You have not yet added any items yourself.
ACCOUNT_PAGE.NO_ITEMS_LIKED: You have not yet added any items to your favourites.
ACCOUNT_PAGE.WELCOME2: Welcome to your account. Here you can find or edit your favourites and added items. You can also change the settings of your account here.
ACCOUNT_PAGE.DELETE_ACCOUNT_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account? If you delete this all your data including added items will also be deleted. This action is irreversible.
ACCOUNT_PAGE.MY_ITEMS_STATUS_MODAL_TITLE: Change the status of the item
ACCOUNT_PAGE.MY_ITEMS_STATUS_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: You can change the visibility to others by placing the item online or offline.
ACCOUNT_PAGE.MY_ITEMS_DELETE_MODAL_DESCRIPTION2: do you want to delete? This action is irreversible
ACCOUNT_PAGE.LOGOUT_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to log out?
